name: Wrecking ball (itch)
description:
Game for NOKIA 3310 JAM. 

The task of the game is to remove blocks from the selected field.

W or Up Arrow =  pull up the ball

S or Down Arrow = pull down the ball

A or Left Arrow = move the crane to the left

D or Right Arrow = move the crane to the right

Support the developer: 5469420020178953
